posts.post_content:
Here's a nice little companion piece for anyone collecting Kimball & Co's baseball cards.  This original trade card measures 4" x 6".  There is some creasing to the upper right corner and the reverse has some 100 + year old doodling.

Price is $12.00 (including first class shipping).  Please email or PM me if interested.

[IMG]http://i248.photobucket.com/albums/gg184/IronHorse2130/Baseball%20BST/kimballtradecard.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i248.photobucket.com/albums/gg184/IronHorse2130/Baseball%20BST/kimballtradecard1.jpg[/IMG]

We will take it

E mail sent


Bruce DOrskind
America's Toughest Want List
[url]bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com[/url]
Neat card and another megadeal made!!!  :)   (just kidding Bruce, it is neat though)
A megadeal indeed! ;)  Item has been sold!
